summary: A couple of friends decide to have a good time and play a trick on an unmarried woman. Therefore one of them has to pretend to fall in love with her.
cast: Betsy Blair|José Suárez|Yves Massard|Luis Peña|Dora Doll|Alfonso Godá|Manuel Alexandre|José Calvo|Matilde Muñoz Sampedro|René Blancard|María Gámez|Lila Kedrova|Josefina Serratosa|Julia Delgado Caro|José Prada|Pilar Gómez Ferrer|Manuel Guitián|Margarita Espinosa|Pilar Vela|Elisa Méndez|Ángeles Bermejo|Amelia Ortas|Mayte Bellido|Elsa Fábregas|Antolín García|Mari Ángeles Herranz|Teófilo Martínez|Fernando Rey
director: Director: Juan Antonio Bardem (as J.A. Bardem)
title: Calle Mayor
